comments: Herro (MIA) is retreating in Pippen Jr.'s (MEM) path when incidental foot-to-foot contact occurs during the drive toward the paint.
Adebayo (MIA) moves alongside Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) path, absorbing the marginal contact during the offensive player's drive.
Adebayo (MIA) firms up in Jackson's (MEM) path and absorbs the contact as the two players come together during the pick.
Martin (MIA) brings his left arm toward the ball and brushes Williams Jr.'s (MEM) side shortly after the change of possession. The contact on the play is marginal.
Herro (MIA) brings his arm toward the ball as he comes alongside Pippen Jr. (MEM), and marginal contact occurs as Pippen Jr. raises his off-arm and continues his drive.
As the shot is released into the air, Butler (MIA) and Pippen Jr. (MEM) come together, and incidental foot-to-foot contact occurs.
Adebayo (MIA) firms up in Konchar's (MEM) path and brushes Konchar's arm as the two players disengage after the pick.
Konchar (MEM) brings his hand toward the ball and marginal brush contact occurs with Herro (MIA) during his drive toward the paint.
Martin (MIA) releases the ball within five seconds of receiving it from the game official.
Robinson (MIA) and Konchar (MEM) engage and disengage during the inbound and the contact is marginal.
Adebayo (MIA) turns slightly as he firms up in Konchar's (MEM) path, and marginal contact occurs as the two players come together during the pick.
Butler (MIA) reaches in for the loose ball and makes contact with Williams Jr.'s (MEM) arm, which impacts his control of the ball as he returns to the floor.
Pippen Jr. (MEM) brings his hand toward the ball and marginal brush contact occurs with Butler's (MIA) arm after the release of the pass.
